publicationStmt.publisher: The Characters that shaped the Silk Road - A Database and Digital Paleography of Tarim

history.provenance: found in Qizil Miŋ-ÖyRothkuppelraumduring T III MQR 35

language.ana: frg:ls-cetom-archaic frg:ls-peyrot-A1 frg:ls-C14 frg:ls-malzahn-A4 frg:ls-C14 frg:ls-tamai-A2 frg:ls-C14

seg.seg: ... soll der Weise denken und nicht der Leidenschaft frönen.
... the wise shall think and not indulge in [the] passion[s].
I will teach these causes to you, and this great compassion
I will teach these causes to you, and this great compassion.
Das eigene Leben geben sie hin, fremdes behüten sie vor Gefahr.
[Their] own life they surrender, the [life] of others they protect from danger.
... ergriffen sie den Uttara [und] führten [ihn] auf die Leichenstätte. Dort (legten sie ihn) auf ein Holz, wiesen an ...
... they seized Uttara [and] led [him] to the charnel ground. There (they laid him) onto [a piece of] wood, ordered ...

b7 ... ergriffen sie den Uttara [und] führten [ihn] auf die Leichenstätte. Dort (legten sie ihn) auf ein Holz, wiesen an ... 387

  • Translation from [[Meunier 2013]] (181):
    a4 "n'ayant pas accompli une bonne action ..." –Martin (Wed, 2015-08-19, 17:02:01 (CEST))

additional classification A1
a3 I will teach these causes to you, and this great compassion

a1 ·_p_alsk[o]yy aiśewmye eṅ_k_al mā _ṣ_ap yamīt_r_a 9 sseyi pelki – – – – [p·] a /// a2 ·e sso_i a_ś_aṃ cce no srukalle : _k_atkoṣ preke piṇ[ṭ]vāt ra ors[ā] – – ·y· ccä sū 10-1 /// a3 – sā _m_akte ka 10-2 ākse_u toṃ _ṣ_armnā ye_s_s_aṃ ce_u _ṣ_ap karuṇ orocce : – ssā yopsā pudñäkt[e] r[i]n(e) /// a4 – tsī : krent yamor mā yāmo_ṣ_aṃ ce[n] (·)[o] _ś_accätsī pkate 10-4 ce [_m_a] – – [s]ā_k_a – – lo_inn= ontsoyä – – : po[n_t_a] /// a5 pkāte _n_aktsī we[l](ñ)[enta] ccen_t_s _s_alye kar_m_aṣṣentsä : weskeṃ skh_k_aśa pudñäkt(e) _k_l_aṅttsi – – – – – 10-6 ṣeṃ ra r[iṃ]ñ toṃ ālloṅ[kna] /// a6 – yo – – – – m[ai]yya sū 10-7 śaul nemce _t_ar_k_anālle kreñcepi ste ś[au]m(o)nts[e] : mā ste waike we_ṣ_ṣ_alle k_u(c)e /// a7 /// l(·)elle klye_u_ṣ_alle rṣākentse rā wroccepi 10-9 ce_u _m_ant wälo weñā-ne /// a8 /// ṣal[ā]n_t_ameṃ (śr)eṣṭhi yo[ṣ]il(·)e tumeṃ arttatte s[u] s· k· /// b1 /// _ṣ_ap no kūw[o] s·[ṃ] no 20-2 pr(o)sko ste waikeṣṣe[p](i) nr(ai) [p]r· /// b2 /// ·v·[tth·]m· sū _m_ant reki waike weña : wrottse wlo yudhiṣṭhīre tusā kla /// b3 [s]u _k_a[ll]y· – – – ñ śaul rī_n_askent_r_a pes_t\ paskentr allyek ñyätsemeṃ 20-5 [m·]ṣ·e[nts]e cpī viśali śnoy tay mā /// b4 kren_t_aṃ pe[k]w[e] – 20-6 pekweṃ cceṃ sū kāmāte pattrainne cpī [u]tari : te – – – – kai tā_u pe[s_t\] sū caukā /// b5 – ślek su uttare : tesa rmer kā kent[s]a tā_u lyaka ly_k_añ ce_u tārśī(cce 20-)[8] _p_arsk= [ā] – ·ṣukintsā lyä[_k\] – – o ·[e] /// b6 – aṣtsā uttari 20-9 pattrai ite yäsārsa ot cai śāmna lyakare : e[ṅ](san)[t](e) ce_u uttareṃ [ā_ṣ\] lyä ·e /// b7 ṅs(a)nte ce_u uttareṃ erkenmāsa wayānte 30-1 omp ce_u orne ·e – – e_n_aṣṣā(nt)e /// b8 +lex:v-p-nap-ä|·eñcä ket śil su māka prākre : yewe ñäkteṃ śamnān_t_s_a [p]o – – – _ṣ_ṣ_a[ll(·)i] ///
